entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
